R

Ratio - Class in fraction
For creating an object that can store a rational number.
Ratio(int, int) - Constructor for class fraction.Ratio
 
RatioInput - Class in fraction
Class to calculate fractions with the help of the console the input must be int the format (-)XX(/(-)XX) (+|-|*|/) (-)XX(/(-)XX)
RatioInput() - Constructor for class fraction.RatioInput
 
RatioMain - Class in fraction
This class is thought to be the starter class calling the input and operator objects.
RatioMain() - Constructor for class fraction.RatioMain
 
RatioOperator - Class in fraction
Class includes several method to do mathwork on fractions.

RatioWriter - Class in fraction
Class gives a nice formated output for the RatioFramework
RatioWriter() - Constructor for class fraction.RatioWriter
 
reciprocal(int, int) - Method in class fraction.RatioOperator
Calculates the reciprocal by interchanging both integer values and stores them onto the global fields: resultNumerators and resultDenomerators.
